segments.content: The [2024 edition of JS rising stars](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en) is out, you can start by having a look at which libraries performed well on this flawed but still useful metric of GitHub starts. Spoiler: `shadcn/ui` gained the most stars (again). SÃ©bastien commented the [Tooling section](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en#section-build).

segments.content: If your authentication isn't **helping you grow**, it's **holding you back**.
segments.sourceMdx: If your authentication isn't **helping you grow**, it's **holding you back**.

segments.content: With [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024), you get everything you need to launch and scale your B2B product:
segments.sourceMdx: With [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024), you get everything you need to launch and scale your B2B product:

segments.content:
* **Easy to understand** [documentation](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024) and **friendly, fast support**.
* **UIs that cover all your use cases** - signup, login, MFA, organization management and more.
* **User impersonation** so you can provide top-notch support to your users.
* **Enterprise SAML/SSO** and **advanced security features** so you can be upmarket-ready.
* **User insights** to help you strategize and expand.

segments.content: Explains what Next.js is trying to accomplish, and why `â€use cacheâ€` is a compiler directive and not a function (to be able to analyze closures and determine the right cache key).
segments.sourceMdx: Explains what Next.js is trying to accomplish, and why `â€use cacheâ€` is a compiler directive and not a function (to be able to analyze closures and determine the right cache key).

segments.content: React is adding support for View transitions with a `<ViewTransition />` component that integrates with all the async features like Suspense and `startTransition`.
segments.sourceMdx: React is adding support for View transitions with a `<ViewTransition />` component that integrates with all the async features like Suspense and `startTransition`.

segments.content: Reactile is an UI/UX turnkey framework which features an out-of-the-box, intuitive tiling display with workspaces. It encourages parallel workloads for large web solutions within a single browser tab. Implement your own view containers, widgets and logic using React and let Reactile handle the display for you.
segments.sourceMdx: Reactile is an UI/UX turnkey framework which features an out-of-the-box, intuitive tiling display with workspaces. It encourages parallel workloads for large web solutions within a single browser tab. Implement your own view containers, widgets and logic using React and let Reactile handle the display for you.

segments.content: On top of that, Reactile also offers:
segments.sourceMdx: On top of that, Reactile also offers:

segments.content:
* A promise-based persistence mechanism which permits a uniform workflow across time and on multiple devices.
* The possibility to use nested tabs for your tiles.
* A simplified global search mechanism.
* CSS @container based responsiveness.
* And much more.
segments.sourceMdx:
- A promise-based persistence mechanism which permits a uniform workflow across time and on multiple devices.
- The possibility to use nested tabs for your tiles.
- A simplified global search mechanism.
- CSS @container based responsiveness.
- And much more.

segments.content: Version 2 coming out soon. Get started with your unique 30-day free trial. Learn more about it on reactile.net.
segments.sourceMdx: Version 2 coming out soon. Get started with your unique 30-day free trial. Learn more about it on reactile.net.
